item.description:
We'll have a discussion with snacks and wine, and then head out for some more drink and song at lime light http://www.meetup.com... . I am asking for a $10 cover fee for the snacks and to cover the rental charge for the sky room.

Here is what this event is meant to be:

It's basically a SOCIAL event that includes reading a book and getting together once a month to discuss the book, Then having some drinks. This meet-up, which I hope to offer once a month, is aimed at sharing, good, scientific literature, philosophical literature, inspiring stories, and the occasional piece of fiction.
item.how_to_find_us: It's at the Sky room, Use the entrance on Amherst St.
item.name: February Book & Wine ( Infidel by Ayaan Hirsi Ali )
